description: i hate it it will not work on you game you want it to

I prefer this over apps like Bottles or Lutris since it uses vanilla Wine, but was unable to debug prefixes on Steam Deck due to specific shell dependencies (Konsole not supported). Running Winetricks on prefixes (but not templates) also produces the error "Unknown file arch" for each package selected. Switching templates will not work properly without restarting the app.
